spells.name: Air Geyser
spells.description: Blast of air deals 2d6 bludgeoning damage and knocks opponent upward.

spells.name: Heart of the Metal
spells.description: Enable weapons to overcome DR like adamantine, cold iron, or silver.

spells.name: Nauseating Trail
spells.description: Creature leaves a trail of stinking cloud squares.

spells.name: Silver Darts
spells.description: Cone of silver darts deals 1d6 piercing damage/level, less against armored targets.
